dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 415 IH: GEAR UP for Counseling
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Lawrence introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend GEAR UP to require that schools receiving funding under the program provide students with access to academic and mental health counseling services, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as GEAR UP for Counseling.

section.header: Requirement of academic and mental health counseling
section.text: Section 404D(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1070a–24(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Providing participating students access to academic and mental health counseling services.

section.text: Section 404H of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1070a–28) is amended by striking 2009 and inserting 2018.
